item.title: Ultra Realistic Truck Physics & Cabin Motion V1.6 1.56 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 18, 2025

Ultra Realistic Truck Physics & Cabin Motion V1.6 1.56 ATS

The Ultra Realistic Truck Physics & Cabin Motion Mod is precision-built for keyboard, gamepad, and wheel users, bringing
unprecedented immersion, authentic handling, and real truck dynamics to ATS.

Features
Realistic suspension stiffness and damping — tuned for air-spring accuracy
Natural chassis sway, body roll, and realistic braking torque
Trailer flex physics via 5th wheel resistance and joint angle tuning
Enhanced cabin pitch, roll, and bounce behavior
Realistic wet road grip loss and braking curves
Adaptive steering for all controller types: keyboard, gamepad, steering wheels
Accurate wheel and cabin mass, clutch torque, and inertia values
Smooth at highway speeds, nuanced at low-speed turns, especially in cities and truck stops
Control Device Support
Keyboard: Linearized steering and damping with speed-based sensitivity
Gamepad: Dynamic responsiveness and center return
Steering Wheel (G29, G923, T300, CSL DD): Realistic force feedback balance and suspension feel

Recommended In-Game Settings (ATS)
Truck Stability: 0%
Trailer Stability: 10–20%
Suspension Stiffness: 20–30%
Cabin Suspension: 30–40%
Cabin Movement: 70–80%
Braking Intensity: 30%
FFB Settings (Wheel): 100% Gain, 90% Understeer, 80% Bumps

Credits: Kass

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: XP & Economy Rebalance V1.4 1.56 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 18, 2025

XP & Economy Rebalance V1.4 1.56 ATS

XP & Economy Rebalance fine-tunes the core gameplay systems of Euro
Truck Simulator 2 and American Truck Simulator to create a smoother, more relaxed experience. This mod boosts progression speed, simplifies job access, and dramatically extends delivery deadlines—perfect for players who want to enjoy the journey without the pressure.
Forget racing the clock. With this mod, you can take your time and enjoy the road—delivering cargo is now stress-free.

Key Features:
Starting Bonus: Receive €150,000 when creating a new profile (one-time reward).
“Unlimited” Delivery Time: No more tight schedules—deliver at your own pace.
Massive XP Boost for Parking: Parking the trailer can skyrocket your level (e.g., Level 0 → Level 42).
Always Full Cargo Market: Say goodbye to empty cargo listings.
100% Truck Refund: Sell your trucks and get your full money back.
Fuel Discount: Fuel at your garage is 95% cheaper.
Online Truck Purchase: Buy trucks online anytime—no need to own one first.
No Abandonment Fines: Cancel jobs with zero penalty.
Emergency Fuel: Emergency refuel gives you 500 liters.
Smarter AI Drivers: Your hired drivers earn more and are more efficient.

Credits: Kass

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Clean Traffic No Default SCS Trailers V1.5 1.56 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 18, 2025

Clean Traffic No Default SCS Trailers V1.5 1.56 ATS

Tired of those repetitive SCS default trailers cluttering the roads?

Clean
Traffic – No Default SCS Trailers is a lightweight but powerful mod for
Euro Truck Simulator 2, designed to strip out all SCS-made trailers
from traffic — giving way to custom trailer packs and a more immersive
driving experience.

Removes Almost all default SCS trailers from AI traffic
Ideal for use with custom AI trailer mods like Real Company Packs
Improves realism, aesthetics, and traffic variety
Clean, optimized for performance
Compatible With All Trailer Packs Mods

Perfect for realism lovers, mod collectors, and anyone wanting cleaner, custom-only roads.

Installation:
Place the .scs file into your ETS2 mod folder
Activate it in your mod manager and BELOW other trailer mods
Hit the road and enjoy the new look of clean logistics!

Credits: Kass

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Realistic Brutal Graphics And Weather V9.0 1.56 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 18, 2025

Realistic Brutal Graphics And Weather V9.0 1.56 ATS

Full Enhanced Weather And Graphics
Full Weather System
Compatible To Work With ATS Game Version 1.56.x
New Realistic LED Street Lamps Lighting
New Realistic Semaphores Timings
Compatible To Work With Majority Of Maps
Realistic Reflections, Rain, Sun, Lights etc
Realistic Truck Physics & Cabin (Wet & Dry) – Specific Made To Use With RBGW
Realistic Truck Physics To Work With Keyboard, Gamepad, Or Steering Wheel
Realistic Lights Low/High Beams Based on Latest Truck Lamps Technology – Specific Made To Use With RBGW
Realistic Cloud Shadows
Realistic Sun
Realistic Sun Rays
Realistic Fog, Mist, Haze
Several Types Of Fog Intensity
Realistic Lightning
Realistic Lightning Bolts
Several Types Of Lightning Intensity
Realistic Rain
Realistic Rain Intensity
Over 10 Types Of Rain Intensity
Realistic Water Reflection in Roads Depends
Highly immersive and realistic rain effects, drops, and glass distortion
Realistic Rain Effects
Realistic Rain Sounds
Realistic Thunder Sounds (Over 40 HQ/HD Sounds)
Realistic Thunder Sounds Inside Cabin & Outside Cabin Of The Truck
Realistic Water (Sea, Rivers, Lakes, Ponds, Beach, Dam, Waves etc)
Realistic Water Effects
Rain Particles/Spray Wheels (Own Truck & AI Traffic)
Realistic Night Skies & Moon
Several Different Types Of Weather
Several Different Types Of Sunset / Evenings
Several Different Types Of Nights / Day
Several Different Types Of Dawn / Sun Rises
Compatible With Convoy
Custom Truck Outside View – Further Zoom Out (Keyboard Key 2) Zoom In / Out (Mouse Wheel)
Works With Low Ends PC´s (As Long Your PC Meets The Official Minimum Requirements For ATS)

Credits: Kass

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder.
